analysis.key_quote: This would allow civil servants to be legally fired for political reasons. That is anathema to the ethos of the American Civil service that serves regardless of the politics of the party in power, preserving institutional knowledge and ensuring consistency in providing public service to the American people.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and the integrity of the civil service, emphasizing the importance of nonpartisan service and the preservation of institutional knowledge.
